English: strike first and gain the upper hand (idiom, martial arts term); Making the first move is an advantage.

d.f: `比~`別人~`先~`掌握~`時機~`而~`占~`優勢~。
q: 《`警世通言~．`卷~`二四~．`玉堂春~`落難~`逢~`夫~》：「`鴇子~`說~：『`不若~`先下手為強~。』」

English: strike first and gain the upper hand (idiom, martial arts term); Making the first move is an advantage.
